translations: 兴高采烈的（cheery 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: Even the cheeriest analysts expect that average house prices will continue to fall this year.
sentences.translation: 就是最乐观的分析人士也预计，今年的房价还会下跌。

sentences.sentence: Thus all of them are bound together by affection, and they find their home to be the cheeriest place in the world.
sentences.translation: 爱是维系家庭的纽带，家是让人感到最快乐的地方。

sentences.sentence: Thus all of them are bound together by affection, and they find their home to be the cheeriest place in the world.
sentences.translation: 所有的家庭成员因为爱而连接在了一起，他们把家当做是世界上最温馨的地方。
